extendedInfo.description: Best Surf Game ever ! - More than one million surfers can't be wrong - Thanks for all your support and feedback!Billabong Surf Trip has won a Zon 2010 Award and is nominee for Best Sport game at the 7th IMGAwards.------Check our friend Frankie Chavez music at: http://www.frankiechavez.com------Enjoy the perfect mix of Surfing Simulation and Arcade Action in âBillabong Surf Tripâ. The adrenaline rush begins as you grab your board and explore the worldâs best surfing spots on your way to becoming the ultimate pro surfer. Discover the unique feeling of an amazing surf barrel and the power of your board when performing an aerial maneuver. REAL LOCATIONSExperience different waves and master the trick challenges at 15 instantly recognizable locations from the World Champion Surf Tour. Huntington Beach, Jeffreys Bay,Teahupoo, Fernando de Noronha are just a few of the visually stunning recreations that await you and your board. Each destination has been recreated with exceptional accuracy and because of the innovative wave simulation system, the game actually recreates the type of waves you find at each location in real life. No two waves are the same!REAL SURFERSGet essential tips from 2012 ASP World Champion Parko and Billabongâs A-team Pro surfer Taj Burrow. Let these guys guide you on your way to become the worldâs greatest surfer!REAL ACTIONPaddle out to the line up and drop into huge waves. With 18 unique real-life tricks to master youâll need use your skills to get to the top. Boost some airs or get barreled to rack up points and achievements!REAL CHOICEItâs your surfer so customize and choose from a variety of boards, suits hairstyles and boardshorts to create the pro-surfer YOU want. Different wave swells may need different kind of boards and it's up to you to discover the best option.UPGRADE TO FULL!In this free version, youâll be able to play Burleigh Heads beach in Surf Trip and Surf Spots!Upgrade ingame to unlock +11 Surf Spots, New Maneuvers, Extra Boards and Extra Suits!

reviews.title: Righteous, but only one lvl
reviews.comment: Pretty cool game, needs more development, more lvls.. Cool, cool concept though! I really wanted to take off on my home breat too, HB bra.
reviews.author: Chris Hanlon

reviews.title: The minute I saw the name, I knew it was a quality surf app...
reviews.comment: However, would the developers care to answer me, where in the \'surf trip\' do I get to see the name I picked? Because, my surfer girl wants to know, why in the outfit change it appears \"Alyssa\" instead of Mara her name...? And this after it almost crash a few...  Thank you. I like to fix it without losing her good score. She was a PhD in everything.   Finally a realistic surf app! Do we ever leave Australia\'s Burleigh Heads in this trip?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only 1 level
reviews.comment: Loved it then could only do onr beach.  Lame.
reviews.author: Guy Needham

reviews.title: Crappy
reviews.comment: This game is lame.. one surf spot and the controls suck.. fix this game and you\'ll get a few more stars
reviews.author: Ryan Bongard

reviews.title: Crashing
reviews.comment: Cool once you\'re in.crashes everytime I try reenter game.phone freezes.would be awesome if bugs were fixed
reviews.author: Jason Janks

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Finally a surf app for android. Great effort here and really appreciate surfers creating apps for surfers. Fun game. Hint ... use cheat to unlock levels if your having trouble.
reviews.author: Joe Whisler

reviews.title: This is a p o s game
reviews.comment: Bad development, scam for money, and a boring game. Dont bother, your better off hitting the bong than playing this game.
reviews.author: Clay Webster

reviews.title: GREAT BUT...
reviews.comment: it needs an active internet connection.  PLEASE DIDABLE THIS STUPID FEATURE THEN I WILL GIVE IT 5 STAR!
reviews.author: Junaed Syed

reviews.title: Good and bad at the same time
reviews.comment: I hate how you have to have a15mb update right after you get the game
reviews.author: Quenton Russell

reviews.title: Integrate the 15MB patch with the playstore download
reviews.comment: I wish these guys would have integrated the 15mb download that you are forced to get right after downloading this from the play store. It takes ridiculously long to download the update, and with no progress indication, your sitting around for ever just to be able to play it for the first time.. fix that and you\'ll get 5 stars from me!
reviews.author: James Schraw

reviews.title: Disrespectful for customers
reviews.comment: The thing that bothers me most is that this app shows little respect for long time customers. Over the years I\'ve spent about \342\202\2543000,- ($4000,-) on surfing merchandise, most of which from Billabong. I truly thought that the app would be a nice customer reward. Just something to mess around with because they appreciate all the money and support we gave the companies we pay for. Turned out to be another capitalistic application, doing everything it can to give you the bare minimum and lure you into paying them even more money. I don\'t care about the money, I can afford it. But I hope Billabong doesn\'t forget what the target is about. I don\'t think that the capitalistic exploitation of a group that tends to be in a rebellious sub-culture works out pretty well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game, needs some work
reviews.comment: Really enjoying this game, however a little tweaking and it could be amazing. There should be an option to record and replay your sick runs. Also I don\'t seem to be able to switch back to a board or outfit that I have already purchased.  Also it would be cool to listen to a playlist or soundtrack while surfing. Like I said the game is a lot of fun but I think these suggestions while take it to new level of gaming
reviews.author: Robert Grupp

reviews.title: good fun
reviews.comment: great app for surf fans, however how to pull off a carving 360 as cannot get past this trick, very annoying..
reviews.author: Kit Dowden

reviews.comment: Constantly crashing and freezes up my device...Uninstalled
reviews.author: James Keenan

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: You can only surf one wave everything else is locked. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Kara Parent

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.comment: Its a really awesome game. Prob the best surf game on the market. Just needs updates. Finished the game in a few days and I\'m bored now. Add more challenges and places to surf. Maybe even competitions.
reviews.author: Nicholas Vassiliades

reviews.title: Surfers pay their dues...
reviews.comment: Bought the paid version and now I know why. Respect the surf and abilities and you will be rewarded...
reviews.author: Mark Gray

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: It\'s good but when I go on surf trip and it shows the guy talking to me when it shows me standing on the beach and I hit next or skip it freezes and I have to exit the game. Please fix and I\'ll rate 5 stars.
reviews.author: Allison Oberlies

reviews.title: \"Great Alley-Oop \" Error (?)
reviews.comment: When playing the game as a goofy footer I can nail just about any trick except they great alley oop maneuver which prevents me from unlocking new locations. Im more than sure i followed the steps to do this trick but somehow it never seems to kick. Its kinda frustrating and I hope there is a solution to this so that I may rate 5 Stars.
reviews.author: sean taylor

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Bit shonky but better than most.... until you can\'t unlock the second wave. One (rubbish) wave?
reviews.author: Toby Jones
